content: Create a press release in HTML format to announce the launch of a new mobile app called FitTrack. FitTrack is a fitness tracking app that helps users achieve their health and fitness goals. The app allows users to track their workouts, monitor their progress, and connect with other fitness enthusiasts. It also provides personalized recommendations based on users' fitness goals and preferences. The app is available for download on both iOS and Android platforms. The press release should include a brief overview of the app's features, its target audience, and a call-to-action encouraging readers to download the app. Additionally, it should include quotes from the CEO and other key stakeholders, as well as links to the app's website and social media pages.
